question:
Match the content of List I with List II:

| List I | List II |
|---|---|
| 1. Polyembryony | p. Black pepper |
| 2. Perisperm | q. Banana |
| 3. False fruit | r. Lemon |
| 4. Parthenocarpy | s. Apple |
explanation: Polyembryony occurs in Lemon (1-r). Perisperm is found in Black pepper (2-p). Apple is a False fruit (3-s). Banana is an example of Parthenocarpy (4-q).
